summary: This is the Chinese translation of the original Castlevania Abandoned Castle-demo mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Castlevania Abandoned Castle-demo.
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19869/
All credit to the original author LordKarnak. 

Introduction
The demo of the first part of Castlevania mix is out at last. Includes the begining of the full mod\'s quest with ending at a specific point, the Abandoned Castle from CoD with all it\'s assets, enemies inspired from the original CoD and a combine system you can use in combine anvils.

For more information, please refer to the original mod.

Installation
This is only a Chinese .esm file , please go to original page to download the main file.
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with LordKarnak, thank him for this great MOD!

If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!

About our group
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAMâ„¢ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: skyrimmodteam@gmail.com
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: LordKarnak
